The concentration of the solution is 6.2 mol/kg, which is the
saturation concentration given by the JC model at room
and close to the experimental value
and us. In fact, in our
simulation of up to tens of nanoseconds, the system does
equilibrate at this concentration of room temperature.

where the angle brackets indicate the ensemble average, and
denote the number of atoms in the
central position of this bin, and the volume of a bin,

(from 0.2 to 0.6 Å) and have not observed any evident eﬀect
Regarding the ionic hydration structure, the water in the ﬁrst
hydration shell (FHS) has the most important inﬂuence on the
structure and properties of the system;
will only focus on FHS. The schematic illustration of FHS of
deﬁned as ﬁrst minimum of radial distribution functions
(RDFs) between ions and oxygens. We have found that
is 3.25 and 3.75 Å, respectively. To further
characterize the local environment of an ion, two coordination
number of water molecules in FHS, the so-called hydration
is the number of the nearest counter ions.
, the ions in the crystal are not taken into
As approaching to the interface, the spatial translational and
rotational symmetries of ions in the solution may be broken
partially. To characterize these eﬀects, four angles (
is the unit vector from the
central ion to oxygen atoms, and

). It needs to be pointed out that, due to
